data.message: I wish I could create the game I have in mind "Gold Mine-Em!" a trailer park ho has to keep leveling up to get better clothes, and skills, to make it from a barefoot poor chick in an alley , through the trailer park, ghetto projects, secure a sugar daddy... to an apartment, hold a job, buy and own a house... then maybe at end may meet Eminem, if she has everything shes supposed to and all the skills, gets to spend night with Shady, He'll slip her a $20 , and pay for her cab home in the morning, lol. If she's still lacking some "slim requirements, he bitch slaps her and leaves her at the gate...LOL, does that sound cool? Mine-Em is all the letters in his name, and with Mine-craft doing so well, I thought it would be a huge hit?...
